title: Cybercriminals Exploit Remote Monitoring Tools to Infiltrate Logistics and Freight Networks
description: Bad actors are increasingly training their sights on trucking and logistics companies with an aim to infect them with remote monitoring and management (RMM) software for financial gain and ultimately steal cargo freight.
